paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 students ready to be enrolled. Each student is unique and comes with its own set of gears.

In the year 2050, portals to the spirit world mysterious opened all around the world. With the opening of these portals, an outburst of Mana came spewing forth into the world, granting humans powers beyond their imagination. Spirits now roam the Earth and live together with humans.

With humanity’s new found power, schools specializing in training students to use their powers to their fullest potential have started popping up worldwide. Among the best of those schools is Sengoku High.

Styles.title: Disciplines
Styles.description1: Humanity’s power can be split into four disciplines, each with their own strengths and weaknesses.

features.title: Sword
features.subtitle: 刀
features.text: Students of this Discipline focus on strengthening their spirit to enhance their bodies. Students are expected to endure grueling training to strengthen their body, mind, and spirit to overcome any adversities.

features.title: Stealth
features.subtitle: 暗殺
features.text: Students of this Discipline are able to conceal their presence using their spirits,  making them suitable for out of sight combat. They are taught multiple skills like espionage and the usage of concealed weapons.

features.title: Sorcery
features.subtitle: 魔法
features.text: Students of this Discipline are able to control the elements that make up the world by manipulating the Mana around them. They are able to perform miraculous displays of power that would leave anyone in awe.

features.title: Summoning
features.subtitle: 召喚
features.text: Students of this Discipline are able to give material form to the spirits that have come to inhabit this world. By enhancing the spirits with their own power, they are able to be stronger together than apart.

texts.title: And More
texts.text: Each character comes equipped with a set of gear with varying rarity ranging npmfrom common to legendary.
A character's total power is determined by the combined rarity of its gear.
The power level and rarity of each character will play a role in our future game, which includes PvP. Characters of certain rarities will also be given as giveaways in contests and events.

Roadmap.title: Roadmap
Roadmap.description1: Each milestone is unlocked after a certain percentage of Student NFT have been minted. Any suggestions for new concept are welcomed.

Team.title: Team
Team.description: We are developing a project that revolves around anime style content and our objective is to create a NFT that is not just a regular token, but something that has utility in our project ecosystem that we are creating.

paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 fighters ready to be enrolled. Each fighter is original, come with its own style and weapons.

Hayato is a 17 year old boy who is exceptionally gifted in fully utilizing his powers. He has aspirations to join the expedition teams sent into the spirit world for exploration.  Fortunately for him, a scout named Megumi from Sengoku High, has recognized his potential.

Not wanting to waste the opportunity to improve his skills for a chance to join an expedition team, Hayato enrolled into Sengoku High. Unbeknownst to Hayato, Megumi has an ulterior motive for scouting him in the first place.
